CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Golden Harvest Cooperative relative to Riverbend Plantation?
SRP.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative is {below} Riverbend Plantation in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Misty Meadow Acres relative to Sunstone Farms?
SRP.A: Misty Meadow Acres is {above} Sunstone Farms in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sunstone Farms relative to Golden Harvest Cooperative?
SRP.A: Sunstone Farms is {above} Golden Harvest Cooperative in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total organic farming area?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Sunstone Farms}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total organic farming area?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Riverbend Plantation}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Sunstone Farms's maximum Organic Farming Area in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Sunstone Farms's maximum Organic Farming Area is in {1971}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Misty Meadow Acres's minimum Organic Farming Area in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Misty Meadow Acres's minimum Organic Farming Area is in {1958}.

NC.Q: Was the total Organic Farming Area in 1968 higher or lower than in 1971?
NC.A: The total organic farming area in 1968 was {lower} than in 1971.

NC.Q: Between 1969 and 1971, did the total Organic Farming Area experience a larger or smaller change than between 1960 and 1971?
NC.A: The change in total organic farming area between 1969 and 1971 was {smaller} than between 1960 and 1971.

NC.Q: Between 1959 and 1968, did the total Organic Farming Area experience a larger or smaller change than between 1961 and 1969?
NC.A: The change in total organic farming area between 1959 and 1968 was {smaller} than between 1961 and 1969.

NC.Q: Was the total Organic Farming Area in 1960 higher or lower than in 1969?
NC.A: The total organic farming area in 1960 was {lower} than in 1969.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Sunstone Farms} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Sunstone Farms and Riverbend Plantation first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Sunstone Farms and Riverbend Plantation first exchanged leading positions in {1957}.
